product_name: CliniqueMoisture Surge Face Spray Thirsty Skin Relief
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Moisture Surge Face Spray is a refreshing, hydrating mist with activated aloe water. Spritz it on anytime for a boost of oil-free moisture.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin Types.Rapidly replenishes skin's moisture level with a fine mist.Softens and soothes in a flash.Take it with you for an on-the-go moisture boost.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Allergy testedBuilt on Dermatological Science: As a dermatologist-guided brand, Clinique's commitment to safety starts with skincare science. Clinique partners with the best minds in dermatology and formulate for all skin types, tones, concerns - in service of all skin.Key IngredientsActivated aloe water: Water is infused with aloe leaf extract to help deliver intense hydration.Glycerin: Attracts and binds moisture to skin.A blend of anti-irritants, including aloe, chamomile, sucrose, and caffeine, help soothe and calm skin.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilDenatured alcoholSynthetic colorsSLSSLESSulfatesGlutenFragranceItem 2260643How To UseHold face spray 10-12" from face. Close eyes and spray a light mist. Use in addition to daily moisturizer, under or over makeup, whenever skin feels thirsty. Avoid spraying into eyes. Follow with Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator Moisturizer.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Dipropylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Centella Asiatica (Hydrocotyl) Extract, Saccharomyces Lysate Extract, Yeast Extract / Faex / Extrait De Levure, Caffeine, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile), Trehalose, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sucrose, Sorbitol, Disodium EDTA, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Hold face spray 10-12" from face. Close eyes and spray a light mist. Use in addition to daily moisturizer, under or over makeup, whenever skin feels thirsty. Avoid spraying into eyes. Follow with Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator Moisturizer.
ingredients: Yeast Extract / Faex / Extrait De Levure

Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: DO NOT BUY
reviews.comments: This made my face/eyes burn so badly that washing it off would not eveb help

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: I was at the ocean where it is always windy.  This product worked well to keep my skin hydrated.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Great product

reviews.headline: Great spray
reviews.comments: This is a nice refreshing spray

reviews.headline: I love this Clinique moisture surge face spray
reviews.comments: This product is true to its word. I can definitely feel that this moisture surge face spray is working almost immediately. It also feels cool  to the touch when its sprayed on the face and neck. Thank you for making this travel size moisture surge spray very affordable. Love it!

reviews.headline: L would you this product again
reviews.comments: Love this spray

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: This is a great product. My husband is bald and uses it on his head. Also great for sunburns.

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: Love this spray, use it in the morning when I wake up, before bed, before my makeup, throughout the day over my makeup. It is so refreshing!!! Only downside is the price point but I'm on my 3rd bottle and bought a travel size

reviews.headline: Perfect midday pick-me-up!
reviews.comments: I use this after applying powder over my foundation and as a midday moisturizing pick-me-up! Love it! I also carry the travel size mini in my purse

reviews.headline: Perfect face spray
reviews.comments: I first purchased the travel size of this to try it outâ€¦I haven't even finished that one yet and I have already purchased the full size. This spray is literally perfect and exactly what my skin was needing. I spray it after applying all of my skin care or before i put on my makeup, you can spray it whenever and it'll get the job done.

reviews.headline: Love this stuff
reviews.comments: I ride horses and go to alot of competitions, i keep this stuff in my bag every time i absolutely love it! I have super long days at shows and this stuff is great for afterwards. Its lightwight and hydrating, doesnt have a bad smell and just helps my skin feel refreshed after being in the sun all day.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love it feel refreshed

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I bought this stuff a while back when UD stopped their primer .. and I love this stuff.  It drenches your skin and feels great!! Clinique is number 1 in my book!!

reviews.headline: My new love
reviews.comments: Have used Sunday Riley's moisturizing mist and Neutrogena's moisturizing mist for years, but this Clinique is my new favorite for sure!

reviews.headline: Hydration!
reviews.comments: I was looking for a nice facial spray that has hydration, and I usually go for a rose water spray. I saw the reviews for this and thought I'd give it a try. I'm not familiar with many of Clinique products, but every product I've tried was pretty good. I saw this on sale, and purchased it, glad I did. It's a very fine poof of water droplets onto your face, and instantly, your face is hydrated. I think this beats my favorite rose water, I'm obsessed with spritzing my face and delicate neck and chest area. This is a new staple in my skin regimen.

reviews.headline: Holy Water? maybe!
reviews.comments: This stuff is amazing. I'd never go a day without using it if I could afford it! Travel size is a game changer to keep in your bag while traveling, and my sensitive skin just drinks it all up. Unfortunately the convenience is just barely not worth the price!

reviews.headline: Best hydrating spray
reviews.comments: it's easy to use

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Great product! Perfect for dry winter weather

reviews.headline: I absolutely love this spray!
reviews.comments: For lovely lazy days when I don't want to slather moisturizer all over my face, I just spray this and go! I love to use it after a shower or in the morning after I was my face. It's so refreshing!

reviews.headline: Light moisturizer
reviews.comments: Might not be for everyone but it is just what I was looking for. Light not greasy or heavy.

media.headline: I have bought this for the last 2 years!!
Very moisturizing I would buy again!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I usually buy Clinique products after sampling them, either sent to me or at a Clinique counter. Since I hadn't tried it, I did think of all the facial sprays I bought before that did nothing. What I did know though was that this was a Clinique spray AND a Moisture Surge one at that and I LOVE every Moisture Surge product I own. I purchased it anyways and as soon as it arrived I gave it a go. Wow. It really does hydrate. It can stand on it's own for that quick "drink of water" for your skin, but where this really shines is when used in combination with other MS products. What I do after cleasing my face is apply the MS Supercharged Concentrate. Once that is absorbed, I use a little MS Extended Thirst Relief (or MS Overnight Mask) on top, apply my All About Eyes Rich and a lipbalm. The last thing I do is use this MS spray all over my face. It supplies all of the other products with that much more moisture to grab on to and push into the skin and makes them work 10 times better than just on their own. My skin is thriving and is so much softer, smoother, plump and fresh. This facial spray does look "spendy" on the surface but I feel it is an investment in my skincare. My skin looks so much better lately and that makes me feel better about myself. I feel that way about all the MS products I own and I have no doubt that any products introduced into this line will be equally superb. 

PS. Clinique: any thoughts of making a dedicated Moisture Surge cleanser?
faceoff_positive.headline: Not just another facial spray....

faceoff_negative.comments: I received a sample of the Moisture Surge cream, and I loved it. When I came to clinique.com to purchase it, I saw the spray. It was less expensive, and a spray seemed more convenient than a cream. I was wrong. The spray is like a film. It leaves a weird feeling on your skin. It doesn't feel fresh. My skin doesn't seem as moisturized as when I used the cream. I should have stuck with the cream.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not What I Expected
